title: Arizona Lawyer Helps Families Bury Their Living Dead (Audio)
itunes:title: Arizona Lawyer Helps Families Bury Their Living Dead (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Thomas Asimou, founding partner at Asimou & Associates, discusses how he is helping families of missing persons to settle legal issues stemming from their absence. He speaks with Bloomberg’s June Grasso and Michael Best.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
